sentences.english: The following four years were filled with their touching love.

sentences.english: This is also the rains of autumn, but there are no rainy days.

definition: continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
lasting for ages/long drawn out/remote in time or space/unhurried/a great number (of events)/preposterous/pensive
